
A little program to test the different PSX resolutions.

Press START + SELECT to reboot.

Buttons:

START : Toggle between START/END, OFFSET and PRESET mode.
SELECT: Toggle between 15BIT NORMAL, 15BIT REVERSE, 24BIT NORMAL and
        24BIT REVERSE.

Mode START/END:
  L2/R2: Change Y-mode.
  L1/R1: Change X-mode (will move between NTSC/PAL).
  D-pad: Change start of display (upper left corner).
  []^OX: Change end of display (bottom right corner).

Mode OFFSET:
  D-pad: Change VRAM offset (upper left corner).

Mode PRESET:
  D-pad: Change between presets.

Contact:

Write to me at: maro [at] amidog [dot] se
Get latest version from: http://psx.amidog.se

History:

1.2 (2013-12-31): Added PRESET mode and system info. Layout changes.
1.1 (2013-07-01): Interlace bugfix.
1.0 (2013-06-29): First release.
